transformations.name: NumFila
transformations.description: Agrega datos de aeropuertos de origen ordenados por mes/dÃ­a y crea una columna con un identificador de fila basado en ese criterio

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OriginAirportCode as string,
		Month as integer,
		DayofMonth as integer,
		CRSDepHour as integer,
		DayOfWeek as integer,
		Carrier as string,
		DestAirportCode as string,
		DepDel15 as integer,
		WindSpeed as integer,
		SeaLevelPressure as integer,
		HourlyPrecip as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceDataFlowELT
sourceDataFlowELT window(over(Carrier = Carrier),
	asc(Month, true),
	asc(DayofMonth, true),
	NumFila = rowNumber()) ~> NumFila
NumFila sink(input(
		{1} as string,
		{2019-01-01} as string,
		{texteo de prueba} as string,
		{9.99} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'SalidaPruebaWindow_1.csv') ~> sink1
